sen.j: 天円地方（てんえんちほう）とは、天は円く、地は方形であるという古代中国の宇宙観である。
sen.e: Ten-en-chi-hou is an ancient Chinese view of the universe which considers the heaven as round and the earth as square.
Ten-en-chi-hou is an ancient Chinese view of the universe which considers the heaven as round and the earth as square.
Ten-en-chi-hou is an ancient Chinese view of the universe which considers the heaven as round and the earth as square.

sen.j: 中華文化圏の建築物や装飾のモチーフとして用いられる。
sen.e: This idea has been used as a motif of buildings and ornaments of Chinese cultural sphere.
This idea has been used as a motif of buildings and ornaments of Chinese cultural sphere.
This idea has been used as a motif of buildings and ornaments of Chinese cultural sphere.

sen.j: 天が円で表されるゆえんは、星の運行が円運動で表されるためである。
sen.e: The heaven has been expressed as round because the movement of stars are represented as circular motion.
The heaven has been expressed as round because the movement of stars are represented as circular motion.
The heaven has been expressed as round because the movement of stars are represented as circular motion.

sen.j: 天円地方をモチーフとした建築物
sen.e: Buildings which uses Ten-en-chi-hou as a motif
Buildings which uses Ten-en-chi-hou as a motif
Buildings which uses Ten-en-chi-hou as a motif
